worlds.name: Frontier Sector
worlds.description: A remote galactic sector on the edge of known space, filled with unexplored systems and ancient mysteries.

locations.name: Kepler System
locations.description: A binary star system with three habitable worlds and rich asteroid fields.
locations.notes: Key trade hub for the sector

locations.name: Kepler Prime
locations.description: The primary world of the Kepler System, featuring sprawling cities and advanced infrastructure.

locations.name: New Manhattan
locations.description: The gleaming capital city of Kepler Prime, home to the Sector Council.

locations.name: Asteroid Belt Alpha
locations.description: A dense asteroid field rich in rare metals and crystals.

factions.name: Colonial Federation
factions.goals: Maintain order and expand human presence in the frontier
factions.resources: Military fleet, administrative infrastructure, taxation authority
factions.notes: The primary governing body of the sector

factions.name: Stellar Trade Consortium
factions.goals: Control interstellar trade routes and maximize profits
factions.resources: Merchant fleet, banking networks, trade stations
factions.notes: Powerful corporate entity with significant political influence

factions.name: Red Nebula Pirates
factions.goals: Raid shipping lanes and avoid Federation patrols
factions.resources: Fast attack ships, hidden bases, black market contacts
factions.notes: Notorious pirate confederation operating from nebula hideouts

factions.name: Kepler Scientific Institute
factions.goals: Study alien artifacts and advance human knowledge
factions.resources: Research facilities, archaeological teams, advanced sensors
factions.notes: Leading research institution investigating pre-human civilizations
